snippet: The violist Lev Zhurbin’s CD “Ljova: Lost in Kino” brings together two dozen selections from film scores he has composed or arranged from 2005 to 2011.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews CD from violinist Lev Zhurbin.
lead_paragraph: The violist Lev Zhurbin’s CD “Ljova: Lost in Kino” brings together two dozen selections from film scores he has composed or arranged from 2005 to 2011.

headline.seo: Lev Zhurbin’s ‘Ljova: Lost in Kino,’ a CD of Movie Scores
headline.main: Lev Zhurbin’s ‘Ljova: Lost in Kino,’ a CD of Movie Scores
